item.title: Communal Garden Unkept, 14th June
item.description:
First reported on Friday 7 March 2025 and dismissed as a private residential garden. This is a communal garden that gets ignored by the companies contracted to clean and maintain our COMMUNAL GARDENS. Has not been touched in over a year. Full of rubbish.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Redwald Road, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Numerous piles of debris, 14th June
item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Bazalgette Way, Lower Belvedere, London

item.title: Likely abandoned vehicle blocking Waitrose Beckenham two way car park, 14th June
item.description:
Likely abandoned silver BMW with heavy damage to the drivers side and heavily cracked front windscreen left obstructing the two way entry to Waitrose Beckenham NR3 1SD. Contacted both 101 and Bromley Council out of hours team and both told me to report on website - VEHICLE NEEDS MOVING ASAP AS IT IS CAUSING OBSTRUCTION TO TRAFFIC.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Southend Road, Beckenham, London
Report on FixMyStreet
